column4: I'm having a smidgen of trouble...  WHat are the packages I need to run a samba server?
I already have the newest version, copied my old smb.conf over, and no love.  I do remember windows having trouble "checking again" for new servers though... That could be the trouble
doesn't show up fo rthe windows boxes.  It doesn't show up even in "view workgroup computers"
I just have to wait for XP to dummy up then?
What error message do you get when you connect to "//<yourip>/"?
Try "\\192.168....\" instead (backslash instead of forward, assuming you have a 192.168.* IP address)
I am able to see it via //192....   It just doesn't show up yet in the list on network neighborhood
I'm afraid I can't help much there. Check any firewalls and look for samba options containing "*browse*" ... good luck
and take a hammer to the windows boxes?
